title: [Question] Parent teacher meeting after isa?
content: I heard that we have parent teacher meeting after each isa's ,is it true. What about the students whose parents are living abroad or too far from Bengaluru.

comments.body: Its just for namesake for the last three yrs i never even told my parents about the meeting lol , look man if ur parents are actually interested to come to the meeting then in no way u can stop them if they arent , dont even bother to inform
College students have PT meetings? ðŸ˜‚
I remember telling my parents about the PTM in my first year and they said they wouldn't show up even if *I* wanted them to ðŸ˜­
I don't blame them, travelling to PES was a 1.5 hours journey that involved multiple modes of transport
